charges.charge_description: 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A) and 18 USC 2 CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (crack cocaine) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 139 months &; a consecutive sentence of 12 months purs to 18:3147, for a total of 151 months. This sentence also includes case 5:98cr451. The Ct makes the following recommendations to the BOP: deft to participate in"500 hour"drug treatment program. Deft to be placed in a facility near family in Northern OH. Deft to receive credit for time srvd. Deft is remanded to the custody of the USM. Upon release from inprisonment, deft shall be on super rel for a term of 3 yrs w/conditions of drug testing. Special assessment ordered in the amt of $200.00 for count 1 in 5:98cr451 &; count 1 in 5:99cr259. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A) and 18 USC 2 CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (crack cocaine) (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Upon motion of the USA the Ct has dismissed counts 2 &; 3 in case 5:99cr259 as to deft Jeffrey Jenkins. (2)
